verses.text:
Guilty, but with heart relenting,
Overwhelmed with helpless grief,
Prostrate at thy feet repenting,
Send, O send me (omit) quick relief!

Whither should a wretch be flying
But to him who comfort gives?
Whither from the dread of dying
But to him who ever lives?

While I view thee, wounded, groaning,
Breathless on the cursed tree,
Pain I'd feel my heart believing
Thou didst suffer this for me.

With thy righteousness and Spirit
I am more than angels blessed;
Heir with thee, all things inherit,â€”
Peace and joy, and endless rest.

Saved! the deed shall spread new glory
Through the shining realms above;
Angels sing the pleasing story,
All enraptured with thy love.
